modName: Autocasting Magic AND Bunny Hop AHK SCRIPTS
summary: Continuously generate and dual-cast spells by holding down the right mouse button (Increases DPS significantly over manual casting). Convert holding spacebar into a bunny-hopping script(useful for climbing mountains).
descriptionHtml:
There are two versions of each; an uncompiled version, and a compiled version. The uncompiled version is the source code, you need [url=http://www.autohotkey.com]AutoHotKey[/url] installed to use it in this form. The compiled version works even without AHK installed, both function the same.

[color=CC0000][b]***INSTALLATION***[/b][/color]
Double click the file. There will be an AHK icon [b][color=00CC00][[/color]H[color=00CC00]][/color][/b] placed in your system tray(by the clock). Nothing is \"installed\", it is simply running and can be started from any directory.

[color=CC0000][b]***UNINSTALL***[/b][/color]
Right click the icon in the system tray and click exit. Delete the file.

[color=CC0000][b]***BunnyHop***[/b][/color]
While holding spacebar the game receives repetitive spacebar inputs as if the user was repeatedly pressing spacebar. This is nice for mountain climbing. You can hold spacebar down while trying to find that sweet spot which lets you jump a little higher =]

[color=CC0000][b]***AutoCast***[/b][/color]
Holding down the right mouse button will repeatedly dual-cast non-continuous spells like paralyze and incinerate. [b][u]To pause/suspend this script press the Pause/Break keyboard button.[/u][/b]

DPS is increased by minimizing the time spent generating the cast and minimizing the wait time between starting a new cast [u][b](1 cast per .8 seconds)[/u][/b]. This number can be reduced slightly but fps lag can cause the game to miss a cast so a little extra delay was added.

Note - For long cast master level spells you will need to use the left mouse button while this script is enabled.

[b][color=00CC00]Version 2:[/color][/b]
Fixed sometimes casting in independent hands when the right mouse button was first held down.

[b][u]Added a new option to cycle cast between each hand. You can toggle to and from this mode by pressing the \"x\" button. (2 casts per .8 seconds)[/u][/b]
author: camy
